overview: At funrides, our commitment to excellence is reflected in our 100% five-star rating on Google. With hundreds of reviews from satisfied customers, we take pride in consistently delivering funrides products and service.
This unparalleled reputation sets us apart from the rest of the events and entertainment competition. Please be assured your that your event is in the hands of trusted RPii trained professionals.
premium_guarantees: Approachable friendly polite team dedicated to making your event safe and a success every time!!
Around the clock customer service team to answer all your calls and messages.
safety_certifications: Fully compliant with the European standard EN14960.
Each item has a current annual safety inspection certificate.
Items come with a design review pack.
We provide a Risk assessment and method statement.
Items are PAT tested where required.
We also carry a £5,000,000 public liability insurance policy.
operator_certifications: All our Team members are PIPA qualified for correct operation and supervision of inflatable play equipment.
Additional Qualification of RPii trained team in also delivering and setting up our funrides at your chosen grounds or venue.
usage: Ideal for all your indoor and outdoor events and special occasions.
This castle can be easily paired with slides, ball pools, soft play, and matching mat setup to make an incredible package.

title: Adults Bouncy Castle - Plain No Theme - Pink & Purple
subtitle: BIG BLUETOOTH SPEAKER + DISCO LIGHT INCLUDED

image.alt: Adults Bouncy Castle - Plain No Theme - Pink & Purple

product.name: Adults Bouncy Castle - Plain No Theme - Pink & Purple
description: One of our new purchases and additions to our outstanding funrides 2024 fleet!!
The Plain No Theme bouncy castle is an amazing addition to any birthday party or event, a modern gloss to match the funrides gloss finish on all our inflatables.
If this amazing inflatable wasn't already good enough why not take your special event to the next level by adding the ultimate bouncy castle upgrade to include disco lights & big Bluetooth speaker.

The Plain No Theme bouncy castle is ideal for all your indoor and outdoor events and special occasions. This castle can be easily paired with slides, ball pools, soft play, and matching mat setup to make an incredible package.
Have our trained team deliver and setup this inflatable at your home or chosen venue.

details.paragraph: It is our duty to help create The Best!! Premium Events & Entertainment of 2024. We understand as events organizers it can be a stressful time organizing your event. Please be assured with regards to your Premium Bouncy Castles, Slides, Assault courses & Inflatable games we guarantee it will be one less thing to worry about once you have booked with us.
details.emphasis: Never to be mistaken with lesser lower services offering low quality older cheap bouncy castles for hire!!

The Circus Themed bouncy castle is an amazing addition to any birthday party or event, boasting the classic cartoon circus artwork which is finished in a modern gloss to match the funrides gloss finish on all our inflatables.
If this amazing inflatable wasn't already good enough why not take your special event to the next level by adding the ultimate bouncy castle upgrade to include disco light's & big Bluetooth speaker.

The Circus Themed bouncy castle is Ideal for all your indoor and outdoor events and special occasions. This castle can be easily paired with slides, ball pools, soft play and matching mat set up to make an incredible package.
Have our trained team deliver and setup this inflatable at your home or chosen venue.
